title: Reverse an Array
description: Given an integer array arr of size n, implement an efficient algorithm to reverse the array in-place, i.e., without using any additional space for another array. Your implementation must modify the original array such that the element at index i swaps with the element at index n - 1 - i for all valid indices i
input: First line contains a single integer n, the size of the array. Second line contains n space-separated integers, the elements of the array.
output: Print the reversed array in a single line with space-separated integers.

title: Find Maximum Element
description: Given an array of integers, find the maximum element in the array.
input: First line contains n, the size of array. Second line contains n space-separated integers.
output: Print the maximum element in the array.

title: Remove Duplicates from Sorted Array
description: Given a sorted array nums, remove the duplicates in-place such that each element appears only once and return the new length.
input: First line contains n, the size of array. Second line contains n space-separated sorted integers.
output: Print the new length of array after removing duplicates.
constraints: Array is sorted in non-decreasing order
